```{r}
library(deSolve)
library(pracma)

parameters <- c(m = 0.445, r = 0.11,
                rho = 1.29, c = 0.05,
                mu = 0.1, g = -9.81)

state_straight <- c(velocity = c(x = 5, y = 28, z = 11),
                    position = c(x = 7.23, y = 0, z = 0))

state_curve <- c(velocity = c(x = 5, y = 28, z = 11),
                 position = c(x = 7.23, y = 0, z = 0))

state_up <- c(velocity = c(x = 5, y = 28, z = 11),
              position = c(x = 7.23, y = 0, z = 0))

times <- seq(0, 1, by = 1)

model <- function(t, y, parms){
  with(as.list(c(y, parms)), {
    velocity <- c(velocity.x, velocity.y, velocity.z)
    F_air <- -c * velocity^2
    F_zw <- m * g
    F_tot <- F_air + F_zw
    acc <- F_tot / m
    print(acc)
    return(list(c(velocity.x, velocity.y, velocity.z, position.x, position.y, position.z)))
  }
  )
}

out <- as.data.frame(ode(times = times, y = state_up, parms = parameters, func = model, method = "euler"))

```
